definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: howling;—[[וִילָלָה]] Zep 1:10; cstr. [[יִֽלֲלַת]] Je 25:36, Zec 11:3; [[יִלְלָתָהּ]] Is 15:8, Is 15:8; —howling in distress Is 15:8, Is 15:8 (‖[[זְעָקָה]]), Je 25:36 (of leaders of flock, metaph. for princes; ‖[[קול חעקה]]), Zep 1:10 (‖ id.); [[קול יִֽלֲלַת הָרׂעִים]] Zec 11:3 ([[רעים]] metaph. for princes).
